# KiCad project files to ignore

# Automatic backup files
*.bak
*.bck
*.tmp
*.swp

# User-specific settings
*.kicad_prl
*.kicad_sch-bak
*.kicad_pcb-bak

# Exported fabrication data
*.gbr
*.drl
*.zip
*.tar.gz

# Simulation and cache
*.spice
sym-lib-table-backup
fp-lib-table-backup

# OS-generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
